description_carte: The Radiant Ascendant. Her light heals allies and burns away shadows.
description_visuelle: A majestic humanoid figure wreathed in golden light, with feathered wings and a serene expression. Light emanates from her outstretched hands.

skills.name: Radiant Beam
skills.description: Fires a beam of pure light at the enemy, dealing damage.

skills.name: Healing Light
skills.description: Heals an ally for a portion of Solara's HP.

skills.name: Divine Shield
skills.description: Grants an ally a shield that absorbs damage.

skills.name: Solar Flare
skills.description: Unleashes a massive burst of light, dealing heavy damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Aegis
skills.description: Increases the defense of all allies.
